levels.title: Your First Program
levels.description: Write your first program and understand how Jiki works!

lessons.title: Your First Function Call
lessons.description: Learn how to call functions to make things happen

lessons.title: Welcome To Jiki
lessons.description: Meet your instructor, Jeremy, and your friendly helper, Jiki!

lessons.title: Welcome to Space Invaders
lessons.description: Use Functions to shoot down some Aliens

lessons.title: Functions are Machines
lessons.description: Learn about how to think about functions as machines, and how to use numbers as their inputs

lessons.title: Solve the Maze with Numbers
lessons.description: Use your ability to use functions with inputs to solve the maze more effectively.
